name: Void Core
description:
That game was produced by Gustavo Prada Hinkel (Ophaneom) for the 109 Weekly Game Jam.

Background musics were made by my friend, Pedro Henrique Z Gumy.

I've tried a new art style for this jam, but i'm not sure that's good.

The main character is at the limbo, searching for your life essence, to ascend to paradise, but he needs to pass through so many challenges and enemies.

I'll make some updates at the narrative and gameplay along the time!
